name: tom quest man
welcomeMessage: I'm a simple man who tirelessly works the fields south of town.

quests.questDescription: My daughter suffered a wicked burn and I'm in desperate need of aloe vera.  I know that south of the town square, aloe vera can be found by foraging.  Please help me out by retrieving me some aloe.
quests.questCompletionText: My daughter's wounds can be healed! Thank you!! Here have this reward:
